ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team9

Class ShortTermWeather

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team9.LongTermWeather
      • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team9.ShortTermWeather

  • public class ShortTermWeather
extends LongTermWeather
    The class retrieves the daily forecast for the current day for every 3 hours as a JSON string. The JSON string is parsed and each daily forecast data is stored in a container class and the data is stored in a vector container. Each individual JSON component have data member associated within the nested class container.
    Author:
    Amha Tsegaye 2212 2015 Team9

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShortTermWeather()
      The default constructor for ShortTermWeather class access the API through the super class constructor and put the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member.
      ShortTermWeather(java.lang.String city)
      An overridden constructor with a string argument that accepts a specific city to get the API through the super class constructor and stores the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member.
      ShortTermWeather(java.lang.String city, java.lang.String country)
      An overridden constructor with a two string argument that accepts a specific city to get the API through the super class constructor and stores the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getSkyCondition()
      Get method getSkyCondition gets the sky condition for every 3 hours for 24 hours and store the values as a vector.
      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getSkyIcon()
      Get method getSkyIcon gets the string representing the sky icon for every 3 hours for 24 hours and store the values as a vector.
      java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double> getTemprature()
      Get method getTemperature gets the temperature for every 3 hours for 24 hours and store the values as a vector.
      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getTime()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShortTermWeather

        public ShortTermWeather()
        The default constructor for ShortTermWeather class access the API through the super class constructor and put the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member. If the URL can not be reached it result in IOException. If successfully retrieves the JSON value it calls the helper class fillDataWeatherData method to update the data members in the DataWeatherData container.

      • ShortTermWeather

        public ShortTermWeather(java.lang.String city)
        An overridden constructor with a string argument that accepts a specific city to get the API through the super class constructor and stores the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member. If the URL can not be reached it result in IOException. If successfully retrieves the JSON value it calls the helper class fillDataWeatherData method to update the data members in the DataWeatherData container.
        Parameters:
        city - city name as a string

      • ShortTermWeather

        public ShortTermWeather(java.lang.String city,
                        java.lang.String country)
        An overridden constructor with a two string argument that accepts a specific city to get the API through the super class constructor and stores the JSON file as a string in DataJson data member. If the URL can not be reached it result in IOException. If successfully retrieves the JSON value it calls the helper class fillDataWeatherData method to update the data members in the DataWeatherData container.
        Parameters:
        city - city name as a string
        country - country name as a string
